body_html: @meteorcloudy The reason why this was not caught before merging was because we do not test PIP install on Mac in PR tests. We test that only in nightly builds. The PR tests test only PIP install on Linux. It's a tradeoff between the speed of testing and thoroughness of testing. @gunan may have other thoughts, but I think our current mac resource doesn't allow us to test Mac PIP install for every PR.

The PR tests test only PIP install on Linux. It's a tradeoff between the speed of testing and thoroughness of testing. @gunan may have other thoughts, but I think our current mac resource doesn't allow us to test Mac PIP install for every PR.
